title: Dungeon rat

properties.value: Dungeon rats are rare monsters found only in select members' dungeons. They play a key role in the Clock Tower quest in which players poison their food trough so that they attempt to escape by chewing away a railing, which allows the player to grab the white cog.

Dungeon rats are rare monsters found only in select members' dungeons. They play a key role in the Clock Tower quest in which players poison their food trough so that they attempt to escape by chewing away a railing, which allows the player to grab the white cog.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops (variant 1)
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
  • 3 Drops (variant 2)
    • 3.1 100%
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Goblin Cave125Maplink
Ardougne Sewers121Maplink
Clock Tower Dungeon1211Maplink
Clock Tower Dungeon121Maplink

Drops (variant 1)[edit | edit source]

One particular variant of the dungeon rat, found once in the Goblin Cave and once in the western part of the Clock Tower Dungeon, has identical drops to rats.

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always620
Raw rat meat1Always2140

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Giant rat bone(m)1Always[d 1]Not soldN/A
Clue scroll (beginner)11/128Not sold12
  1. ^ Giant rat bones are only dropped during Rag and Bone Man I.

Drops (variant 2)[edit | edit source]

All other dungeon rats only drop bones.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always620
Rat's tail1Always[d 1]Not sold1
  1. ^ Rat's tails are only dropped during Witch's Potion.
